alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 10:57AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Stone, northeastern Searcy, southeastern Marion and south central Baxter Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1056 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marshall, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Thola... Elberta... Leslie... Big Flat... Zach... Alco... Morning Star... Cozahome... Landis... Maumee Crossing... Timbo... Lone Pine... Harriet... Oxley... Onia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone
